name: Time & Space
description:
Time in space takes place in a futuristic spaceship.  You wake up from a cryogenic sleep and your spaceship is quiet, too quiet. Something is wrong and it's your job to figure it out. OR ELSE 

Controls 

WASD - move  

C - Interact
